A Message for the Churches and New Fields.-- Ministers are to present Christ in His fullness both in the churches and in new fields, that the hearers may have an intelligent faith. The people must be instructed that Christ is unto them salvation and righteousness. It is Satan's studied purpose to keep souls from believing in Christ as their only hope; for the blood of Christ that cleanseth from all sin is efficacious in behalf 
                                                                           193
of those only who believe in its merit.--Gospel Workers, p. 162. (1915)
